text: ma hkdha ynbghy 'an yakun halkm. fa'iidha zulzilat al'ard wkassar beduha bedana, waja' rbbuk lifasl alqada' bayn khlqh, walmalayikat sfwfana sfwfana, waji' fi dhalik alyawm aleazim bjhnm, yawmayidh ytez alkafir wytwb, wakayf yanfaeuh alateaz waltwbt, waqad frrat fihima fi aldnya, wfat awanhma?
